summary: Adds AURYN pendant from The NeverEnding Story to Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/CGMD3fr.png[/IMG][/CENTER]
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/X5RATgG.png[/IMG][/CENTER]
Fixed the \"doubled chest item\" problem.

[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/HBnmp8D.png[/IMG][/CENTER]
This mod adds AURYN\'s Pendant to Skyrim for you to enjoy.

To find AURYN, you will need to reach Skyborn\'s Altar. Once there, you\'ll need to face the enemies around and loot the chest ( pics related ).

Stats, Properties: 

- Trying to follow the \"NeverEnding\" lore, AURYN will give you a constant buff on all your stats. 
Giving you magical protection enough to face all enemies. 
In \"Skyrim language\", AURYN would behave as a superior gauldur amulet.

- There is a Non-Enchanted version too. In case you would like to add it your own ench!

[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/NdPCwZ2.png[/IMG][/CENTER]

There are no issues found. No replacements. Totally compatible with any other mod.

[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/j2nKgf4.png[/IMG][/CENTER]
You can install this with NMM.
If you do it manually, just drop to data files and activate the esp on your load order.
Unninstall with NMM.
If you do it manually, overwrite files from data folder.

[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/V8kh0fw.png[/IMG][/CENTER]
No requirements. 

[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/j7OojAj.png[/IMG][/CENTER]
Bethesda for making the best game ever.
Nexus Site for having such a strong build community.

[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/F5SMP9Z.png[/IMG][/CENTER]
[CENTER][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31402/][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/a0BdfOm.png[/IMG][/url] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32546][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/NLg9bcV.png[/IMG][/url] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32943][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/YWtvu9v.png[/IMG][/url][/CENTER]
author: FurrySwords
